typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: 'Sales Customers',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'model',
	folderPath: 'DatalakeWorkspace/WideWorldImporters',
	fileSystem: 'powerbi') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LocallDB
